title: Intercollege Coding Challenge
description: Competitive programming contest for teams of 3. Participants will solve algorithmic problems under timed conditions to test coding and problem-solving skills.

title: Cultural Night: Rhythm & Dance
description: An evening filled with energetic dance and music performances by student groups from different departments. Celebrate talent, rhythm, and cultural unity.

title: Inter-department Football Cup
description: A knockout-style football tournament among departments, promoting sportsmanship, teamwork, and competitive spirit.
